Description:
Modifications to a config that will serve an adversary's impacts or persistence

Author: Austin Clark
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Cisco Modify Configuration
Query: sourcetype='cisco-aaa' eql select * from _source_ where (log like '%ip http server%' or log like '%ip https server%' or log like '%kron policy-list%' or log like '%kron occurrence%' or log like '%policy-list%' or log like '%access-list%' or log like '%ip access-group%' or log like '%archive maximum%')
